About

A 28-year-old Brazilian, currently living in The Netherlands. I'm a FullStack developer focusing on Spring Boot and Vuejs frameworks. I have been in love with technology since I was a teenager when I watched my father repair computers. I started my career as an intern in computer maintenance and also software testing. I realized that software development was a challenge for me, so why not accepted the challenge? In Brazil I worked with PHP and MySQL database. I've graduation in Computer Information Systems in a private college and also technical course in computer science, both performed in Brazil, by the Federal Institute of Education and Technology (This technical course was held in conjunction with high school, lasting 3 years).

Projects

App in react to study dutch irregular verb

There are a lot of irregular dutch verbs, and as far as I searched I could find an app to study it and also listen to the words sounds

GitHub

API in nodejs to study irregular verb

In order to save the verbs created in the app, It was created also an API to be consumed by the app in react

GitHub

Website created to analyze user's consumption

NFC-e is an electronic fiscal document. It is generated when a good is sale to a costumer. It allows the tax and fiscal control by tax authorities. This website helps the user to understand what/where/how he is consuming goods

GitHub

API in Spring Boot to analyze the user's goods consume

NFC-e is an electronic fiscal document. The API was created to be consume by the website in ReactJs.

GitHub
